text: (He muham'mada!) Manisaharule tapa'isamga candrako (ghataâ€“badha) barema sodhchan, bhanidinu ki yo manisaharuko (puja) samaya ra hajako samaya patta laga'une madhyama ho. Ra neki yo ho'ina ki timi gharaharuko pachadibata pravesa garnegara, baru nekivala tyo ho jo atmasanyami huncha, ra gharaharuma timi mula dhokaharubata pravesa garnegara ra allahasamga dara manne gara taki timi saphala huna saka
